alert.note: Alert for Maricopa; Yuma (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 17 at 6:26PM MST until August 17 at 7:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM MST FOR NORTHEASTERN YUMA AND MARICOPA COUNTIES... At 626 PM MST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles north of Sentinel to 8 miles north of Paloma to 25 miles southeast of Kofa Wildlife Refuge, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Dateland, Sentinel, Paloma and Hyder. This includes AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 68 and 89. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
